text.conditional: "A terrible monster has taken up residence in the mines, Arissa who keeps the store in dammath can tell you more but already mighty saurian warriors have tried and failed to slay it."
"Nissa can't fix the well pump, if she can't do it soon we'll have to take it apart and bring the water up by hand."
"I don't think anyone needs your help anymore, but word of your deeds has passed from mouth to ear"

page.text: "Dammath is the bastion of the queendom of Lauriss and saurian kind. You are welcome here, as friend of scale and queendom."

"Dammath is the bastion of the queendom of Lauriss and saurian kind. We hope you will enjoy your time here, strangers are ever welcome to trade. Though the southlands are harsh they have not impoverished us, but be warned we will not treat kindly those who would befriend our ancient adversary."
"They dwell to the north, coveting the soft and fertile lands for themselves. These tail-less ones are a blight upon our world, seek audience with our queen should you wish to know more."
